translation.ja: オモチャ作(づく)りを手伝(てつだ)ってクリスマス精神(せいしん)を学(まな)べ

translation.en: -Any word on rescuing my brother? -Sorry, ran into a snag.
translation.ja: 弟(おとうと)を救(すく)えそう？ ごめん　問題(もんだい)がある

translation.en: Typical Baby Corp incompetence.
translation.ja: ベイビー株式会社(かぶしきがいしゃ)は無能(むのう)だな

translation.en: Typical Dongle excellence.
translation.ja: ドングルは有能(ゆうのう)

translation.en: I won that trophy for excellence in trophy modeling.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)のモデリングのトロフィー

translation.en: Stop making stuff out of stuff. What's the snag?
translation.ja: 勝手(かって)に作(つく)り変(か)えないで 問題(もんだい)って？

translation.en: Chupie tech is jammed at the North Pole. Stupid Santa Claus.
translation.ja: ばぶちゅーが詰(つ)まってるサンタのせいだ

translation.en: Watch your mouth, Baby Corp mongrel.
translation.ja: 口(くち)を慎(つつし)め 会社(かいしゃ)の駄犬(だけん)

translation.en: It's less than 24 hours until my brother's first Christmas.
translation.ja: 弟(おとうと)の最初(さいしょ)のクリスマスまで24時間(じかん)もない

translation.en: If we can't chupie there, we have to find another way.
translation.ja: 他(ほか)の方法(ほうほう)で北極(ほっきょく)へ行(い)かなきゃ

translation.en: Mom and Dad will be worried sick.
translation.ja: ママとパパは？ 心配(しんぱい)する

translation.en: You relax. Dongle will take care of everything.
translation.ja: 安心(あんしん)しろドングルが解決(かいけつ)する

translation.en: This one's from Aunt Dorothy. "Merry Christmas from Aunt Dorothy."
translation.ja: “ドロシーおばさんからメリー･クリスマス”

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
translation.ja: うれしいな

translation.en: Is that a grenade?
translation.ja: 手榴弾(しゅりゅうだん)？

translation.en: Don't be foolish. Dongle doesn't explode parents.
translation.ja: 焦(あせ)るな親(おや)を爆死(ばくし)させたりしない

translation.en: Dongle kills with poison gas.
translation.ja: 毒(どく)ガスで殺(ころ)すだけさ

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何(なに)？

translation.en: [Mom] Do you smell?
translation.ja: におわない？

translation.en: Dongle told a sick joke.
translation.ja: 冗談(じょうだん)が過(す)ぎた

translation.en: This is Santa's sleeping dust for when the children stay up to see him.
translation.ja: これはサンタが起(おき)きてる子(こ)に使(つか)う眠(ねむ)り粉(ごな)だ

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.ja: 何(なん)だよ

translation.en: Drama is the spice of life.
translation.ja: ドラマは人生(じんせい)のスパイスだ

translation.en: Should give us time to get to the North Pole and back.
translation.ja: 北極(ほっきょく)に行(い)ってくる時間(じかん)はある

translation.en: But with them asleep,
translation.ja: 親(おや)が寝(ね)てたら僕(ぼく)が⸺

translation.en: I have to do the shopping for our traditional fruitcake hockey.
translation.ja: フルーツケーキ･ホッケーの買(か)い物(もの)をしなきゃ

translation.en: Which we play while wearing Hawaiian leis made from snacks. So fun.
translation.ja: スナックのハワイアンレイを着(き)てやる

translation.en: Point is, we need to move fast.
translation.ja: とにかく急(いそ)がなきゃ

translation.en: No sweat. Santa has magic portals in every mall.
translation.ja: モールには魔法(まほう)のポータルで行(い)ける

translation.en: They appear every night after business hours,
translation.ja: 毎晩(まいばん) 営業時間後(えいぎょうじかんご)に現(あらわ)れる

translation.en: but only until 9 a.m. the day before Christmas.
translation.ja: クリスマスの前日(ぜんじつ)は朝(あさ)９時(じ)まで

translation.en: We have 20 minutes.
translation.ja: 20分(ぷん)ある

translation.en: Why didn't you tell us before?
translation.ja: なぜ早(はや)く言(い)わないの？

translation.en: Were you not paying attention when Dongle told you drama is the spice of life?
translation.ja: ドラマは人生(じんせい)のスパイスだと言(い)ったろ？

translation.en: So this is where Christmas comes from?
translation.ja: ここがクリスマスの源(みなもと)？

translation.en: You bet.
translation.ja: そうさ

translation.en: We got Jingly Jangly there doing wrapping paper design.
translation.ja: ジングリー･ジャングリーが包装紙(ほうそうし)

translation.en: Ribbon testing with Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.ja: ティッピー･タッピー･スロッピーがリボン

translation.en: Okay, okay, that one is good.
translation.ja: それはいいぞ

translation.en: [PoopyDoopy] Lala Doo-Da and Diddly Doo write all the best carols.
translation.ja: ララ･ドゥーダディドリー･ドゥが作曲(さっきょく)

translation.en: What kind of nog-house open-mic garbage is that?
translation.ja: 何だそれ　素人(しろうと)のゴミ曲(きょく)か？

translation.en: You wouldn't know a hit if it knocked your tooth out.
translation.ja: ヒットするわよあんたの歯(は)に！

translation.en: And of course, toy-making with me, PoopyDoopy, filling in for Dongle.
translation.ja: オモチャ作(づく)りはドングルの代役(だいやく) プーピー･ドゥーピー

translation.en: I admire your skill.
translation.ja: スキルに感心(かんしん)する

translation.en: Why thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: But I can't help noticing inefficiencies in your systems.
translation.ja: だがシステムの非効率性(ひこうりつせい)が気(き)になる

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何(なに)？

translation.en: I notice you make all your gingerbread from the eggs of a single goose?
translation.ja: ガチョウ１羽(わ)の卵(たまご)からジンジャーブレッドを？

translation.en: That's not just a goose. She's Ginger the Gingergoose.
translation.ja: ただのガチョウじゃないジンジャーガチョウだ

translation.en: Sure. And dare I ask a follow-up?
translation.ja: へえ　さらに聞(き)くが

translation.en: Why have those elves been rubbing gumdrops on the egg for two hours?
translation.ja: なぜガムで２時間(じかん)こすってる？

translation.en: To make it the best gingerbread in the whole world.
translation.ja: 世界最高(せかいさいこう)のジンジャーブレッドにするため

translation.en: Dubious claim.
translation.ja: 疑(うたが)わしい主張(しゅちょう)だ

translation.en: Try this.
translation.ja: 味見(あじみ)しろ

translation.en: This is really good. What's the secret?
translation.ja: おいしい　秘密(ひみつ)は何(なに)？

translation.en: It's made with store-bought chicken eggs and was stuffed in my pocket.
translation.ja: 材料(ざいりょう)は鶏卵(けいらん)だ俺(おれ)のポケットに入(はい)ってた

translation.en: [all] Delicious.
translation.ja: おいしい

translation.en: You guys get it now?
translation.ja: 分(わ)かった？

translation.en: We need to put our gingerbread in your pocket.
translation.ja: 全部(ぜんぶ) 君(きみ)のポケットに入(い)れよう

translation.en: No, my point is efficiency.
translation.ja: 違う　カギは効率(こうりつ)だ

translation.en: You can't mess up gingerbread. Just crack eggs in some batter.
translation.ja: ジンジャーブレッドなんて卵(たまご)と粉(こな)を混(ま)ぜるだけ

translation.en: Why does this goose even have a job, right, Ginger?
translation.ja: なぜ このガチョウに頼(たよ)る？

translation.en: -[squawks] -What else needs fixing around here?
translation.ja: あとは何(なに)を修正(しゅうせい)する？

translation.en: You're watching paint dry? I thought you were on a deadline.
translation.ja: 塗料(とりょう)が乾(かわ)くのを待(ま)つ？納期(のうき)があるのに

translation.en: -We take pride in our wrapping paper. -Just to be torn open?
translation.ja: 包装紙(ほうそうし)に誇(ほこ)りを持(も)ってる 朝(あさ)には破(やぶ)かれる時間(じかん)の無駄(むだ)だ

translation.en: You're wasting time.
translation.ja: 朝(あさ)には破(やぶ)かれる時間(じかん)の無駄(むだ)だ

translation.en: But this is the way we've always done things.
translation.ja: この方法(ほうほう)でやってきた

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.ja: 今後(こんご)は違(ちが)う

translation.en: Boom, efficiency. Hit me with another one.
translation.ja: これぞ効率　次(つぎ)にいくぞ

translation.en: Carol writers, right?
translation.ja: キャロル作曲家(さっきょくか)？

translation.en: Supposed to be.
translation.ja: そのはずだけど

translation.en: But Diddly Doo overdid it on the milk and cookies again.
translation.ja: ディドリー･ドゥはミルクとクッキー浸(びた)り

translation.en: Well, excuse me, Mother.
translation.ja: 悪(わる)かったな 母(かあ)さん

translation.en: You ever feel like working?
translation.ja: 働(はたら)く気(き)ある？

translation.en: We'll work when I tell you.
translation.ja: 気(き)が向(む)いたら働(はたら)く

translation.en: If I can make a suggestion-- Oh!
translation.ja: 助言(じょげん)しようか

translation.en: [both] Don't mess with our creative process.
translation.ja: 創造過程(そうぞうかてい)を邪魔(じゃま)するな

translation.en: You've got the talent of a wreath.
translation.ja: あんた 才能(さいのう)もないくせに…

translation.en: They're fine. What else you got?
translation.ja: 放っとこう　他(ほか)には？

translation.en: I'm not laughing. Toss it.
translation.ja: 笑えない　捨(す)てろ

translation.en: Spin me up on this nonsense.
translation.ja: 何(なん)の茶番(ちゃばん)だ？

translation.en: Everyone knows, ribbon is no good if it doesn't tickle me.
translation.ja: くすぐれないリボンはダメだ

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
translation.ja: それは違(ちが)う

translation.en: Oh, but it is.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)わない

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)う

translation.en: Pretty sure it is.
translation.ja: 確(たし)かだけど

translation.en: He's a genius.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)は天才(てんさい)だ

translation.en: Could it be, everything we've been doing has been wrong?
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)たちのやること全部(ぜんぶ)間違(まちが)ってた？

translation.en: No telling, but yes.
translation.ja: よく知(し)らんが そうだ

translation.en: Please, walk with me.
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)に歩(ある)いて

translation.en: [gasps] A walk-and-talk? You're getting the hang of this efficiency thing.
translation.ja: 歩(ある)き話(ばなし)か？効率(こうりつ)を学(まな)んできたな

translation.en: You're telling me.
translation.ja: 感心(かんしん)したよ

translation.en: You've been here an hour, and our productivity is up 20 percent.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)が１時間(じかん)いて 生産性(せいさんせい)は20パーセント向上(こうじょう)した

translation.en: We might actually get a nog break before Santa leaves.
translation.ja: サンタの出発前(しゅっぱつまえ)にノッグ休憩(きゅうけい)がとれる

translation.en: Why settle for nog? Imagine what else you could have.
translation.ja: ノッグ休憩(きゅうけい)？他(ほか)に何(なに)ができるか想像(そうぞう)しろ

translation.en: Computers for naughty/nice cross-reference.
translation.ja: いたずらっ子(こ)のコンピューター照会(しょうかい)

translation.en: Industrial ovens for mass gingerbread baking.
translation.ja: ジンジャーブレッド大量生産(たいりょうせいさん)オーブン

translation.en: Break rooms full of gumdrop delights.
translation.ja: ガムでいっぱいの休憩室(きゅうけいしつ)

translation.en: And of course, mahogany crafters' lamps.
translation.ja: マホガニーの職人用(しょくにんよう)ランプ

translation.en: Yes, to ward off snow monsters.
translation.ja: 雪(ゆき)の怪物(かいぶつ)を追(お)い払(はら)える

translation.en: Mahogany lamps ward off snow monsters?
translation.ja: マホガニーのランプが？

translation.en: Mahogany does.
translation.ja: マホガニーがね

translation.en: Weird, I was just trying to class up the joint.
translation.ja: ちょうどいい　改築(かいちく)しよう

translation.en: We should redo this entire floor in mahogany.
translation.ja: 全(ぜん)フロアをマホガニーでな

translation.en: Mahogany? No. Why?
translation.ja: マホガニー？ そんな！

translation.en: It'd help Christmas cheer if no one was eaten by a snow monster.
translation.ja: 雪(ゆき)の怪物(かいぶつ)に 誰(だれ)も食(く)われなかったら助(たす)かる

translation.en: These reforms will take an upfront investment.
translation.ja: だが改革(かいかく)には先行投資(せんこうとうし)が要(い)る

translation.en: What's your cash on hand?
translation.ja: 手持(ても)ちの金(かね)は？

translation.en: Fifty trillion hollyberries.
translation.ja: 50兆(ちょう)ホリーベリー

translation.en: -In dollars? -Seven.
translation.ja: ドルでは？ ７ドル

translation.en: Okay, we need to raise revenue.
translation.ja: 収入(しゅうにゅう)を増(ふ)やさないと

translation.en: What do you charge to get on the nice list?
translation.ja: いい子(こ)リストに載(の)る料金(りょうきん)は？

translation.en: The only charge is being the best you can--
translation.ja: 料金(りょうきん)は いい子(こ)であること

translation.en: [Boss Baby] Honk, honk. You sillies are practically feeding cash to the reindeer.
translation.ja: バカめ　トナカイに現金(げんきん)を食(く)わせてるも同然(どうぜん)

translation.en: But it's always been free.
translation.ja: でも常(つね)に無料(むりょう)だった

translation.en: And your boss always wears a red suit to a home invasion.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)の上司(じょうし)は赤(あか)いスーツで家宅侵入(かたくしんにゅう)する

translation.en: Tradition's a dumb reason to do anything.
translation.ja: 伝統(でんとう)はバカな言(い)い訳(わけ)だ

translation.en: You're running a business that's stalled out below its potential. It's killing my soul.
translation.ja: ビジネスの可能性(かのうせい)を大(おお)いに下回(したまわ)って残念(ざんねん)すぎる

translation.en: But good news?
translation.ja: いいニュースは⸺

translation.en: You've got me.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)がいることだ

translation.en: The portal.
translation.ja: ポータルへ

translation.en: What? Yes. Hurry up, let's go.
translation.ja: 何(なに)？ 急(いそ)いで行(い)こう

translation.en: Unmade toys, Dongle is coming.
translation.ja: 未完成(みかんせい)のオモチャ 待(ま)ってろ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: そんな！

translation.en: You had to stop at the snack cart?
translation.ja: スナックを取(と)ってなきゃ

translation.en: I'm pulling double duty.
translation.ja: ２(ふた)つの使命(しめい)がある

translation.en: I have to rescue my brother and keep my family traditions from dying.
translation.ja: 弟(おとうと)を救(すく)うと同時(どうじ)に家族(かぞく)の伝統(でんとう)が死(し)ぬのを防(ふせ)ぐ

translation.en: Stop being so dramatic. There has to be a simple solution.
translation.ja: 大(おお)げさよ簡単(かんたん)な解決法(かいけつほう)があるはず

translation.en: Four plane tickets to the North Pole.
translation.ja: 北極(ほっきょく)への航空券(こうくうけん)を４枚(まい)

translation.en: Great. Does anyone have $11,000?
translation.ja: どうも 誰(だれ)か11000ドルを？

translation.en: I have 700 hollyberries.
translation.ja: 700ホリーベリーなら

translation.en: I had to buy a winter hat.
translation.ja: 冬(ふゆ)の帽子(ぼうし) 買(か)ったし

translation.en: I only have 10K five hunny.
translation.ja: １万(まん)と５ドル

translation.en: So close.
translation.ja: 惜(お)しい

translation.en: Look, super speedy delivery.
translation.ja: 見て　スピード配達(はいたつ)って

translation.en: "Santa letters and packages delivered to the North Pole before midnight"?
translation.ja: “サンタへの手紙(てがみ)を真夜前(しんやまえ)に北極(ほっきょく)へ” これだ

translation.en: We follow the next delivery truck to the airport,
translation.ja: 空港(くうこう)への配達(はいたつ)トラックを追(お)い⸺

translation.en: sneak on a jet disguised as food-service workers.
translation.ja: 食品業者(しょくひんぎょうしゃ)を装(よそお)い飛行機(ひこうき)に入(はい)る

translation.en: When the crew asks, "Is that low-fat?"
translation.ja: “低脂肪(ていしぼう)か？”と聞(き)かれたら

translation.en: I go, "No, it's high fist."
translation.ja: 高(こう)パンチを食(く)らわせる

translation.en: Double thumpers into a roundhouse kick.
translation.ja: ワンツーに回(まわ)し蹴(げ)り

translation.en: We've put two on the ground, because I'm good at kicking.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のキックで２人(ふたり)は倒(たお)せた

translation.en: But we can't control the cockpit until we defeat six crooked co-pilots, each trained in a deadly martial art.
translation.ja: 操縦室(そうじゅうしつ)を乗(の)っ取(と)るには副操縦士(ふくそうじゅうし)６人(にん)を倒(たお)さないと

translation.en: My plan was better.
translation.ja: いい計画(けいかく)だったのに

translation.en: Oh! Watch your elbows, Jimbo.
translation.ja: ヒジをどけろ ジンボ

translation.en: [Tim] Dongle, don't eat all my snacks.
translation.ja: ドングル スナックを食(く)うな

translation.en: -[Dongle] Dongle is not eating anything. -[chewing]
translation.ja: ドングル 食(く)ってない

translation.en: I hear little Chloe is on the naughty list...
translation.ja: 娘(むすめ)さんが いたずらリストに

translation.en: What's it worth to you to get Josie into nice?
translation.ja: いい子(こ)に変(か)える気(き)は？

translation.en: Start Scooter on the $50 nice package...
translation.ja: いい子(こ)パッケージは50ドル

translation.en: Isn't everything more beautiful when it's profitable?
translation.ja: 稼(かせ)ぐのは すてきだろう？

translation.en: This makes me feel yucky,
translation.ja: こんなの不快(ふかい)だ

translation.en: like a sticky candy cane that fell on a floor.
translation.ja: 床屋(とこや)に落(お)ちたキャンディーみたい

translation.en: Remember, you're helping to finance more efficient toy-making.
translation.ja: より効率的(こうりつてき)なオモチャ作(づく)りに貢献(こうけん)してるんだ

translation.en: Things are looking up for your compensation.
translation.ja: 報酬(ほうしゅう)パッケージもある

translation.en: We're gonna get more Christmas cheer?
translation.ja: クリスマスの歓声(かんせい)アップ？

translation.en: -You get paid in Christmas cheer? -I wish.
translation.ja: クリスマスの歓声(かんせい)が報酬(ほうしゅう)？ 報酬(ほうしゅう)はキラキラの笑顔(えがお)さ

translation.en: We get paid in twinkly smiles,
translation.ja: 報酬(ほうしゅう)はキラキラの笑顔(えがお)さ

translation.en: which can be exchanged for Christmas cheer.
translation.ja: クリスマスの歓声(かんせい)と交換(こうかん)できる

translation.en: You have to trade in at the Santa shop.
translation.ja: サンタショップで交換(こうかん)だ

translation.en: They're only open for a half-hour on Thursdays.
translation.ja: 木曜日(もくようび)に30分(ぷん)だけ開(ひら)いてる

translation.en: Unless you send your smiles by penguin messenger, which takes months.
translation.ja: 笑顔(えがお)をペンギン便(びん)で送(おく)るなら数ヵ月(すうかげつ)かかる

translation.en: What kind of hustle is Santa running on you?
translation.ja: サンタめなんてアコギな商売(しょうばい)を

translation.en: We love Santa. We're like a family business.
translation.ja: サンタを愛(あい)してる家族経営(かぞくけいえい)に近(ちか)い

translation.en: Are you? I know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen.
translation.ja: そうか？ 俺(おれ)はダッシャーやダンサーを知(し)ってる

translation.en: All the reindeer do for 364 days a year is eat grass and poop.
translation.ja: 一年中(いちねんじゅう) 草(くさ)を食(く)うだけのトナカイどもだ

translation.en: You elves do all the work, and I couldn't name one of you.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)らエルフは仕事(しごと)を全部(ぜんぶ)してるのに無名(むめい)

translation.en: Except you, DookiePoops.
translation.ja: ドゥーキー以外(いがい)な

translation.en: -PoopyDoopy. -Forget how things have always been done.
translation.ja: プーピー･ドゥーピー 慣例(かんれい)など忘(わす)れろ

translation.en: What do you deserve right now?
translation.ja: 君(きみ)らは今(いま) 何(なに)を得(え)るべきだ？

translation.en: I would like a little recognition.
translation.ja: 少(すこ)し承認(しょうにん)が欲(ほ)しいな

translation.en: [all] Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: -Right. -We should talk to Santa.
translation.ja: サンタと話(はなし)をする必要(ひつよう)がある

translation.en: [man 1] Last delivery for the season.
translation.ja: 今季最後(こんきさいご)の配達(はいたつ)です

translation.en: [man 2] Put it there, right next to the gigantic pile of letters.
